ygData.subject: RE: Time for a new weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: How strong does the party need to be to kill the gnoll that drops it? Thanks Galtin of E ci
ygData.messageBody:
How strong does the party need to be to kill the gnoll that drops it?

Thanks

Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kyle Sibbald [SMTP:ksibbald@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 3:56 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Time for a new weapon
>
> From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>
>
> If you want something akin to the BBK then I have three words for you
> instead.
>
> Kicsh Der Pavs.
>
> Got one last night and it is a very nice blade. Stats are 10/38 (bit
> slower
> than the BBK). Weight is 8.0 (bit lighter than the BBK). Gives you DEX +5.
> Procs for Strong Poison. 30 DD and 14 per tick (dunno duration). With some
> help you should be able to go an get it from Paws.
>
> Good Journey
>
> Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: edwardscanni [mailto:edwardscanni@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 12:39 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Time for a new weapon
>
>
> From: "edwardscanni" <edwardscanni@...>
>
> Well I think I am getting tired of my measly well balanced long sword,and I
> think its time for a new slasher :)
> I was thinking of the Brazen Brass Kilij and was wondering-how common is the
> sand giant with the plans for this quest-is he camped?
> Can he be camped?
> I hate to say, I have been in high keep so long,I forget what the rest of
> the world is like(blinks in the sunlight as he steps outside the keep).
> I never really hunted much in Ro-went to Guk for the first time last
> eek( pretty sad for my level)-never been to CT,or MM. Yes I've led a very
> sheltered life-but back to my original question-any help would be
> appreciated- or is there a better weapon out there i should look for-I dont
> get alot of play time-most I can play at one stretch is maybe 3-4 hours on
> a night when the little woman is asleep :)- so I cant really do a 10 hour +
> marathon.
> Any help would be greatly appreciated. By the way, this is gotta be the best
> list out there :)-Thanks in advance.
>
> Scanna Swiftsinger
> 34th Chorus
> Bertoxx Server
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with
> the subject submissions.
